t: Amazon launches ‘Bazaar’ to offer affordable unbranded products | YourStory
s: With Bazaar, Amazon can leverage its strong logistics network and brand recognition to compete against Meesho and Shopsy, while potentially lowering product prices through the elimination of seller commissions to enhance competitiveness.
